text:
The property owner or project applicant, where appropriate, shall be subject to enforcement for violation of any provision of this chapter, in accordance with 
Chapter 100 of the San Francisco Administrative Code, and any other available legal remedies, at the sole discretion of the General Manager. 
(Added by Ord. 301-10, File No. 101079, App. 12/3/2010)


 

Notes
*
>*Editor's note
     Ord. No. 301-10, File No. 101079, Approved December 3, 2010, repealed former Ch. 63, in its entirety, and enacted provisions designated as a new Ch. 63 to read as herein set out. Prior to inclusion of said ordinance, Ch. 63 pertained to limitations on water use for landscaping in new developments and landscaping renovations. 

 endnote table
